title: Spoonfed: My Life with the Spoons
description: With a string of smash hits - Nova Heart, Tell No Lies, Old Emotions, Romantic Traffic - the Spoons redefined the musical landscape and captured the hearts of its fans everywhere.The Spoons toured extensively, playing sold-out shows with an array of fellow icons including Talking Heads, Police, Culture Club, Simple Minds and many more, during an amazing decades-long journey-adventure that continues to this day.The Spoons gold album Arias & Symphonies was named one of the 20 Most Influential Albums of The '80s by The Chart Magazine, and Nova Heart was recently named one of The Top 100 Canadian Singles.Spoonfed is the compelling life story of Gord Deppe, the Spoons' driving creative force, principal songwriter, lead singer and lead guitarist, whose creative vision defined one of the most influential and original bands of the '80s and beyond.
author: Gord Deppe
